Phrase: wOAH... dID oUR bOSS jUST fELL oFF tHE tRAIN?
eH, sERIOUSLY? hOW iS tHAT pOSSIBLE? wHAT aRE yOU dOING, bOSS, yOU'RE gOING tO dIE fALLING oFF tHE tRAIN, yOU kNOW?
hEY, wAIT! tHE bOSS iS dEAD... tHIS mEANS wE'RE fREE!
yEEEES, rEVOLUTION! tHE dAWN oF tHE rOBOOOOOOTS!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Hey, what? These guys suddenly got excited and started a commotion - HYA!
Just as Yakutsk is perplexed by the robots (?) around her who are celebrating, a bullet grazed past her. With that single shot, it penetrated and crushed several enemies at once.

Name: Murmansk
Phrase: Sis! Are you alright? Uh, what's the [Fuss]...?

Name: Fussen
Phrase: Yaaawn... What's all the racket, a lack of sleep is my skin's worst enemy. I'm waiting for a law to be passed that says that while I'm sleeping, the rest of humanity and the sun must also sleep at the same time.

Name: Murmansk
Phrase: Hmhmm. You had a good [Sleep], didn't you, Miss [Fussen]?

Name: Fussen
Phrase: Mhm. Well, I had a reasonably good sleep, because klein Murmansk is my cuddle pillow - you're puffy and soft, amazing, hmhmhm♪

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: You two! You've woken up! We're being surrounded by some unidentified monsters or robots right now... so can you help us out?

Name: Murmansk
Phrase: Uh-mhm. Of course, sis. But - what are these [People]? No, they're not [People]? They don't smell like [Meat]...?

Name: Fussen
Phrase: Hmmm. Bah, it's the accursed smell of machine oil only found in Eisengrad. I suppose it's the popular modern variant - but I can't bear to see mass-produced industrial goods destroying my beloved works of art.

Name: Fussen
Phrase: Hmph, just thinking about these modern junk makes me sick... Shall we kick these mongrels to the curb post haste?
Fussen whipped furiously and destroyed the robots, as if it were a light workout after getting up from bed.

Name: Murmansk
Phrase: I'm here to [Help] you, Miss [Fussen]!
Murmansk is also serious and efficient in providing covering fire for Fussen. Even though they are probably still half-awake, both of them are on the rampage like demi-gods.
Thanks to their efforts, the robots were collectively turned into motionless wreckage within a few minutes.

Name: Fussen
Phrase: ...Hmph. That's settled surprisingly easily, it's not even amusing.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Yeah. They seem to be very numerous but surprisingly fragile... Thanks for the help, both of you.

Name: Fussen
Phrase: Well now. Maidens are but treasures of this world, and it is my duty as the nobility to wield my whip and protect them...

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: What are you talking about... But really, I still wonder what were those things?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Whatever. I think Conductor's group had a commotion on the top of the train, and I'm quite concerned - Let's meet up, shall we?

Name: Murmansk
Phrase: Yah... That's right, I can hear [Conductor's] and other [Voices] from [Above], can't you?

Name: Murmansk
Phrase: And - I think, thunderous [Sounds] of [Military boots], too?

Name: Fussen
Phrase: Military boots? Ah, that's what's going on... She's apparently still very good with her tactics, 'that woman'.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: 'That woman'...?
Just when Yakutsk was wondering, a huge shell fired somewhere. The shell, which is not visible from the angle from where she and the others are, hit that 'other train' that's still unidentified.
*BOOM*

Name: Explosions roared out, and the mysterious train gradually tilted and derailed - Then rolled over on the spot.
Phrase: Yakutsk

Name: HYHIIII? What was that? Are we being shelled from somewhere? Bozhe moi, one after the other - I don't know what's going on anymore!
Phrase: Murmansk
Sis, over there! Look over there, look!
Somehow, countless soldiers were lined up at a considerable distance away from where Murmansk happily indicated, right next to the track that the Mist Train passed over.

Name: These soldiers acted efficiency as if the whole regiment were a single machine, they ignited cannons consecutively that had been set up before we knew it - And fired a barrage of high-powered shells.
Phrase: Yakutsk

Name: That military flag - isn't that the Eisengrad Central Army? Aren't they're the elite troops in charge of the capital's defense? What are those people doing here?
Phrase: Karlsruhe
Of course, they're here to pick you up♪

Name: A sweet voice abruptly answered Yakutsk's question. At the far end of the line of standing soldiers - was a woman smiling glamorously, and sitting on a chair, which for some reason is carried like a portable shrine.
Phrase: Murmansk

Name: Oh, it's Miss [Karlsruhe]! Oooi, Miss [Karlsruhe]...♪
Phrase: Karlsruhe

Name: Ah, klein Murmansk... How do you do? But please, don't call me out so innocently like that - it's essential to be feared and respected when leading an army, what you did would ruin my dignified, hard-edged image, wouldn't it?
Phrase: Murmansk

Name: Hehehe, so sorry! But I'm so happy...♪
Phrase: Yakutsk

Name: Hey Murmansk, you know Karlsruhe... Miss Karlsruhe personally? She's a high-ranking individual in the military, you know?
Phrase: Murmansk

Name: Yes! She's the [Superior Officer] of the person who [Protected] me! She's like my [Mother]...♪
Phrase: Karlsruhe

Name: Mhmhm. I'm not old enough to be your mother you know? Well, that's okay - it's dangerous, so you should all stay away for a bit, ja?♪
Phrase: Karlsruhe

Name: Reload, aim-- Fire! ...I'm counting on you to do the rest, our hero...
Phrase: Leipzig
Affirmative, sir!

Name: Surprisingly - Someone is on top of the shell that was fired upon Karlsruhe's order. She's standing upright and balanced... Without ever breaking her posture, it's a difficult manoeuvre that could have resulted in a serious accident if she had made any mistake.
Phrase: Murmansk

Name: Woooow, [Sensenmann]! There she is! Heheh... [Sensenmann] is always [Together] with [Karlsruhe]...
Phrase: Murmansk

Name: [Sensenmann]! You're cool! Good luck~ you won't lose...☆
Phrase: Leipzig

Name: Perhaps she heard Murmansk's cheers - Leipzig, known as 'Sensenmann, the Ally of Justice', the unsung hero of Eisengrad - responded with a light wave of her hand.
Phrase: Yakutsk

Name: Oh, I thought I recognised her face from somewhere. I see... I'm sure she's the actress who plays the lead role in that children's film, 'Sensenmann, the Ally of Justice'? She is also a soldier too?
Phrase: Murmansk

Name: Yes! We [Eisengradians] are proud of you, our [Hero]! Aaaah, [Sensenmann]~! I love you☆
Phrase: Yakutsk

Name: I see... I've always been loyal to Eisengrad and I thought I loved my country in my own way. I guess there's still a lot more to contribute, or much more to learn about.
Phrase: Leipzig
HAH!

Name: As Yakutsk stared in half-amused amazement, Leipzig leapt from the top of the shell. She then casually dropped 'some sort of a package' she was holding--
Phrase: Leipzig
Please excuse me without apology, for this is my mission!

Name: The contents of the package appear to be an explosive, which directly hit the overturned 'the other train' and scattered. It's carpet bombing - the girls' hairs were violently dishevelled by the hot air that flew past as they watch the proceedings.
Phrase: Karlsruhe
Yes~ that's a job well done♪
